title: Pipe Spring National Monument: Needle and Thread
body: Needle and Thread        Needle and Thread NPS   Â    Needle And Thread Grass is a perennial, bunchgrass 12 to 48 inches tall. It grows in the spring. Flowering occurs May through June. Seeds are narrow and sharp at the end like a needle with a long tail that resembles a thread. The elevation range is 2000 to 7000 feet.
